cta.headline: Ready for Better Home Comfort?
cta.description: Don't wait for your HVAC system to fail. Our experienced technicians are standing by to help with installation, repair, or maintenance. Call today for fast, professional service backed by our 30+ year reputation for quality and integrity.

services.name: Central A/C & Heating

seo.title: Central Air Conditioning & Heating Installation Nassau County | Alama Service
seo.description: Professional central HVAC system installation & repair in Nassau & Suffolk County. Custom design with proper sizing. Call (516) 239-5340 for free estimate.

services.headline: Central Air Conditioning & Heating Systems
services.description:
At Alama Service, we specialize in designing and installing complete central heating and cooling systems throughout Long Island. Our 30+ years of experience means we know how to properly size and install systems that deliver optimal comfort and efficiency for your specific home.

We work with top-tier equipment brands including Rheem, Carrier, Trane, American Standard, Ruud, Amana, and Goodman. Our certified technicians take into account all elements that influence temperature in your home - from square footage and ceiling height to insulation levels and window placement. This comprehensive approach ensures your new system operates at peak efficiency.

Every installation includes careful ductwork evaluation and modification as needed. We design custom solutions that fit your home's unique layout and your family's comfort preferences. Whether you're replacing an aging system or installing HVAC in a new addition, we handle projects of all sizes with the same attention to detail.

Our installation process begins with a thorough home assessment and load calculation to determine the exact capacity needed. We then present you with options that fit your budget and efficiency goals, explaining the benefits of each system. All work is backed by our unconditional guarantee and performed by factory-trained technicians who stay current on the latest HVAC technologies.

features.title: Proper System Sizing
features.description: We perform detailed load calculations to ensure your system is perfectly sized for maximum efficiency and comfort.

features.title: Top Brand Equipment
features.description: Installation and service of Rheem, Carrier, Trane, American Standard, and other leading HVAC manufacturers.

features.title: Custom Ductwork Design
features.description: Complete ductwork evaluation and modification to optimize airflow throughout your home.

features.title: Energy Efficiency Focus
features.description: High-efficiency systems that reduce energy costs while maintaining optimal comfort levels.

cta.headline: Get a Free Central HVAC System Estimate

services.name: Ductless Mini-Split Systems

seo.title: Ductless Mini-Split Installation Nassau County | Fujitsu Specialists
seo.description: Expert ductless mini-split installation & repair on Long Island. Fujitsu specialists serving Nassau & Suffolk County. Call (516) 239-5340 for service.

services.headline: Ductless Mini-Split Systems
services.description:
Ductless mini-split systems offer the perfect solution for room additions, older homes without existing ductwork, and areas where you want independent climate control. At Alama Service, we specialize in Fujitsu ductless systems, widely recognized as the most reliable and efficient mini-splits available.

Our fully trained technicians can service, repair, and install any brand of ductless unit, but our expertise with Fujitsu systems means you get the benefit of specialized knowledge and faster service. These systems are ideal for converting garages, finishing basements, adding comfort to sunrooms, or providing supplemental cooling and heating in specific areas of your home.

Ductless systems offer several advantages over traditional HVAC: they're more energy efficient, provide individual room control, install with minimal home disruption, and operate extremely quietly. Each indoor unit can be controlled independently, allowing family members to customize comfort in their personal spaces.

The installation process is typically completed in one day with minimal structural modifications required. We mount the indoor unit on the wall, connect it to the outdoor unit through a small hole, and connect the refrigerant lines and electrical. The result is immediate, efficient climate control exactly where you need it most.

features.title: Fujitsu Specialists
features.description: Extensive training and experience with Fujitsu systems, the industry leader in ductless technology.

features.title: Energy Efficient Operation
features.description: Ductless systems use significantly less energy than traditional HVAC while providing superior comfort control.

features.title: Individual Zone Control
features.description: Each unit operates independently, allowing customized temperature control for different areas of your home.

features.title: Quick Installation
features.description: Most installations completed in one day with minimal disruption to your home and daily routine.

cta.headline: Get a Free Ductless Mini-Split Estimate

services.name: Indoor Air Quality Solutions

seo.title: Indoor Air Quality Systems Nassau County | UV Lights & Whole-Home Filtration
seo.description: Improve your home's air quality with UV lights, AprilAire filters & humidity control. Serving Nassau & Suffolk County. Call (516) 239-5340.

services.headline: Indoor Air Quality Solutions
services.description:
The EPA reports that indoor air can be up to 100 times more polluted than outdoor air, making whole-home air quality solutions essential for your family's health. At Alama Service, we offer comprehensive indoor air quality systems including UV light purification, AprilAire whole-home filtration, and complete humidity control.

Our Sanuvox UV light systems destroy biological and chemical contaminants including viruses, bacteria, mold, allergens, cooking odors, pet odors, and VOCs. Unlike standard filters that only trap particles, UV lights actually destroy contaminants as they pass through your HVAC system, providing continuous air purification for your entire home.

For homes requiring exceptional filtration, we install AprilAire Media Style filters that capture particles as small as 0.3 microns - removing dust, pollen, pet dander, and other allergens that standard 1-inch filters miss. These whole-home systems are far more effective than portable air purifiers and work silently within your existing HVAC system.

Humidity control is equally important for indoor air quality. Our Honeywell TrueSTEAM humidification systems add proper moisture to dry winter air, while our dehumidification solutions prevent excess moisture that can lead to mold growth. Proper humidity levels between 30-50% create a healthier, more comfortable indoor environment while protecting your home's structure and furnishings.

features.title: UV Light Purification
features.description: Sanuvox UV systems destroy viruses, bacteria, mold, and chemical contaminants in your home's air.

features.title: AprilAire Whole-Home Filtration
features.description: Advanced filtration systems that capture particles as small as 0.3 microns throughout your entire home.

features.title: Humidity Control Systems
features.description: Humidification and dehumidification solutions to maintain optimal moisture levels year-round.

features.title: Integrated HVAC Solutions
features.description: All systems integrate seamlessly with your existing HVAC for whole-home air quality improvement.

services.name: Humidex Moisture Control Systems

seo.title: Humidex Basement Moisture Control Nassau County | Eliminate Mold & Dampness
seo.description: Eliminate basement mold & moisture with Humidex ventilation systems. Professional installation in Nassau & Suffolk County. Call (516) 239-5340.

services.headline: Humidex Basement Moisture Control
services.description:
Basement moisture and mold problems affect countless Long Island homes, creating unhealthy air quality and potential structural damage. The Humidex system offers a proven solution that eliminates mold and dampness issues by addressing the root cause - poor ventilation and moisture accumulation in lower levels of your home.

The World Health Organization states that occupants in damp or moldy buildings have up to 75% greater risk of respiratory symptoms and asthma. The EPA emphasizes that homes designed to minimize air leakage may have higher pollutant levels without proper mechanical ventilation. The Humidex system solves both problems with a three-step process.

First, the system expels moisture-laden air from your basement or crawl space where humidity levels are highest and mold growth most likely. This contaminated air contains moisture from foundation seepage and normal household activities. Second, fresh outdoor air is drawn into the home to replace the expelled moisture. Third, the system ventilates continuously to prevent stagnant air zones where mold thrives.

The Humidex system operates automatically through an adjustable humidistat that regulates airflow based on humidity levels. When desired humidity is achieved, the fan reduces speed and maintains optimal conditions. Installation requires minimal disruption to your home, and the system operates quietly and efficiently to provide long-term moisture control and healthier indoor air quality.

features.title: Three-Step Moisture Elimination
features.description: Expels contaminated air, replenishes with fresh air, and ventilates continuously to prevent mold growth.

features.title: Automatic Humidity Control
features.description: Adjustable humidistat automatically maintains optimal humidity levels in your basement or crawl space.

features.title: Health Benefits
features.description: Reduces respiratory risks associated with mold and dampness while improving overall indoor air quality.

features.title: Structural Protection
features.description: Prevents moisture damage to foundation, framing, and stored items in lower levels of your home.

services.name: Smart Thermostats & Zone Control

seo.title: Smart Thermostats & Zone Control Nassau County | Honeywell Installation
seo.description: Professional smart thermostat & zone control installation. Honeywell specialists serving Nassau & Suffolk County. Call (516) 239-5340.

services.headline: Smart Thermostats & Zone Control Systems
services.description:
Take complete control of your home's comfort and energy efficiency with professionally installed smart thermostats and zone control systems. At Alama Service, we specialize in Honeywell products including the advanced Prestige 2.0 Comfort System that puts total climate control at your fingertips.

The Honeywell Prestige 2.0 features a high-definition, full-color display that's easy to read and navigate. Its interview-based programming asks questions and programs itself based on your answers, making setup simple for any homeowner. Internet connectivity allows you to monitor and control your HVAC system remotely from a PC, smartphone, or tablet using the free Total Connect Comfort app.

Zone control systems allow you to heat and cool different areas of your home independently, providing customized comfort while reducing energy waste. Instead of heating or cooling your entire home to satisfy one thermostat, zone control uses motorized dampers in your ductwork to direct conditioned air only where needed.

Our technicians receive extensive Honeywell training and stay current on the latest smart home integration technologies. We can integrate your new thermostat with existing home automation systems and provide complete setup and programming. The result is a system that learns your schedule, adjusts for weather conditions, and can save up to 33% on annual heating and cooling costs when used as directed.

features.title: Honeywell Prestige 2.0
features.description: High-definition color display with interview-based programming and full internet connectivity for remote control.

features.title: Zone Control Systems
features.description: Independent temperature control for different areas of your home with motorized dampers and multiple thermostats.

features.title: Smart Home Integration
features.description: Seamless integration with existing home automation systems and voice control devices.

features.title: Energy Savings
features.description: Advanced scheduling and weather compensation features can reduce annual heating and cooling costs by up to 33%.

services.name: HVAC Maintenance Agreements

seo.title: HVAC Maintenance Agreements Nassau County | Preventive Service Plans
seo.description: Comprehensive HVAC maintenance agreements for residential & commercial systems. Prevent breakdowns, extend equipment life. Call (516) 239-5340.

services.headline: HVAC Maintenance Agreements
services.description:
Regular maintenance is the key to keeping your heating and cooling systems running efficiently while preventing costly emergency breakdowns. Our comprehensive maintenance agreements are designed to protect your HVAC investment and ensure year-round comfort for your family.

We offer flexible maintenance agreements to fit different budgets and needs. Our Year-Long Agreement covers both heating and air conditioning systems throughout the year, providing complete protection for residential and commercial properties. For customers who only need seasonal coverage, we offer separate Residential and Commercial Air Conditioning Agreements for spring and summer maintenance.

Each maintenance visit includes thorough system inspection, cleaning of critical components, filter replacement, and performance testing. Our certified technicians check refrigerant levels, inspect electrical connections, clean coils, test safety controls, and calibrate thermostats. We identify potential problems before they become expensive repairs and ensure your system operates at peak efficiency.

Maintenance agreement customers receive priority scheduling, especially during peak seasons when service demand is highest. You'll also receive discounts on repairs and parts when needed. Regular maintenance not only prevents breakdowns but also extends equipment life, improves energy efficiency, and maintains manufacturer warranties that often require annual service.

features.title: Flexible Agreement Options
features.description: Year-round or seasonal maintenance plans available for residential and commercial HVAC systems.

features.title: Comprehensive Inspections
features.description: Thorough system inspection, cleaning, testing, and calibration to ensure peak performance and efficiency.

features.title: Priority Service
features.description: Maintenance customers receive priority scheduling and discounts on repairs when needed.

features.title: Extended Equipment Life
features.description: Regular maintenance prevents breakdowns, improves efficiency, and extends the life of your HVAC investment.

seo.title: About Alama Service Inc | Family-Owned HVAC Company Nassau County
seo.description: Family-owned HVAC company serving Long Island for 30+ years. Expert heating, cooling & air quality solutions with unconditional guarantee. Call (516) 239-5340.

about.headline: Family-Owned HVAC Excellence Since 1990
paragraphs: Alama Service Inc. is one of those rare family-owned businesses that has thrived for over three decades by putting quality and integrity first. We design, install, and maintain residential and commercial HVAC systems throughout Nassau, Suffolk, and parts of Queens, Brooklyn, and Manhattan. When you contract with us, you're investing in proven expertise backed by our unconditional guarantee.

Our highly trained and certified technicians are known throughout the industry as the go-to team for even the most challenging jobs. We stay current with the latest HVAC technologies through regular training and specialize in custom solutions that fit each family's unique needs. From traditional central systems to cutting-edge mini-splits and indoor air quality solutions, we design systems that deliver optimal comfort and efficiency for your home.

What sets us apart is our commitment to doing the job right the first time. We properly size every system by taking all elements that influence temperature in your home into consideration. Our core team of sub-contractors includes licensed carpenters, plumbers, and electricians, allowing us to handle complete home improvement projects with seamless coordination.

After more than 30 years serving the Long Island community, our reputation speaks for itself. We hold honesty, integrity, and quality workmanship as our core values. Every project is backed by our unconditional guarantee because your family's comfort is our primary concern.

whyChooseUs.title: 30+ Years Experience
whyChooseUs.description: Three decades of proven expertise in residential and commercial HVAC with an exemplary track record of professional service throughout Long Island.

whyChooseUs.title: Custom System Design
whyChooseUs.description: We properly size and design HVAC systems specific to your home, taking into account all elements that influence temperature and comfort.

whyChooseUs.title: Industry-Leading Training
whyChooseUs.description: Our certified technicians regularly attend manufacturer training classes and stay current on the latest HVAC technologies and installation techniques.

whyChooseUs.title: Unconditional Guarantee
whyChooseUs.description: We stand behind all work performed with an unconditional guarantee because your family's comfort is our primary concern.
